paragraphs.content: To the chief Musician, Al-taschith, Michtam of David, when he fled from Saul in the cave.
paragraphs.contentHtml: To the chief Musician, Al-taschith, Michtam of David, when he fled from Saul in the cave.

paragraphs.content: Be merciful unto me, O God, be merciful unto me: for my soul trusteth in thee: yea, in the shadow of thy wings will I make my refuge, until these calamities be overpast.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Be merciful unto me, O God, be merciful unto me: for my soul trusteth in thee: yea, in the shadow of thy wings will I make my refuge, until these calamities be overpast.

paragraphs.content: I will cry unto God most high; unto God that performeth all things for me.
paragraphs.contentHtml: I will cry unto God most high; unto God that performeth all things for me.

paragraphs.content: He shall send from heaven, and save me from the reproach of him that would swallow me up. Selah. God shall send forth his mercy and his truth.
paragraphs.contentHtml: He shall send from heaven, and save me from the reproach of him that would swallow me up. Selah. God shall send forth his mercy and his truth.

paragraphs.content: My soul is among lions: and I lie even among them that are set on fire, even the sons of men, whose teeth are spears and arrows, and their tongue a sharp sword.
paragraphs.contentHtml: My soul is among lions: and I lie even among them that are set on fire, even the sons of men, whose teeth are spears and arrows, and their tongue a sharp sword.

paragraphs.content: Be thou exalted, O God, above the heavens; let thy glory be above all the earth.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Be thou exalted, O God, above the heavens; let thy glory be above all the earth.

paragraphs.content: They have prepared a net for my steps; my soul is bowed down: they have digged a pit before me, into the midst whereof they are fallen themselves. Selah.
paragraphs.contentHtml: They have prepared a net for my steps; my soul is bowed down: they have digged a pit before me, into the midst whereof they are fallen themselves. Selah.

paragraphs.content: My heart is fixed, O God, my heart is fixed: I will sing and give praise.
paragraphs.contentHtml: My heart is fixed, O God, my heart is fixed: I will sing and give praise.

paragraphs.content: Awake up, my glory; awake, psaltery and harp: I myself will awake early.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Awake up, my glory; awake, psaltery and harp: I myself will awake early.

paragraphs.content: I will praise thee, O Lord, among the people: I will sing unto thee among the nations.
paragraphs.contentHtml: I will praise thee, O Lord, among the people: I will sing unto thee among the nations.

paragraphs.content: For thy mercy is great unto the heavens, and thy truth unto the clouds.
paragraphs.contentHtml: For thy mercy is great unto the heavens, and thy truth unto the clouds.

paragraphs.content: Be thou exalted, O God, above the heavens: let thy glory be above all the earth.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Be thou exalted, O God, above the heavens: let thy glory be above all the earth.
